font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 破坏，毁坏： the act or process of wrecking or destroying, especially destruction by explosives.
【例】 the demolition of dangerous buildings 危楼的拆毁
【近】 annihilation, decimation, devastation, havoc, wreckage
【反】 building, construction, erection, raising 建造

【记】 demotion 降级
【另】 promote 升职，commotion 动乱
